actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A resolution in tribute to U.S. Ambassador to Colombia, Diego Ascencio.

summary.text: Extends the commendation of the Congress to Diego Asencio, the Ambassador to Columbia, and his family, for their patriotic demeanor during the time the Ambassador was held hostage in Colombia.

titles.title: A resolution in tribute to U.S. Ambassador to Colombia, Diego Ascencio.
